languages.text: Под полупрозрачной пленкой кокона видны смутные очертания разложившегося тела. Внутри раскрытой клетки ребер еще бьется сердце.

traits.locale_text: Под полупрозрачной пленкой кокона видны смутные очертания разложившегося тела. Внутри раскрытой клетки ребер еще бьется сердце.

languages.text: Through the cocoon's translucent film you can see the vague outlines of a decaying body. The rib cage has been broken open, and a heart still beats inside it.
languages.original_text: Под полупрозрачной пленкой кокона видны смутные очертания разложившегося тела. Внутри раскрытой клетки ребер еще бьется сердце.

traits.locale_text: Through the cocoon's translucent film you can see the vague outlines of a decaying body. The rib cage has been broken open, and a heart still beats inside it.
Through the cocoon's translucent film you can see the vague outlines of a decaying body. The rib cage has been broken open, and a heart still beats inside it.
Through the cocoon's translucent film you can see the vague outlines of a decaying body. The rib cage has been broken open, and a heart still beats inside it.
Through the cocoon's translucent film you can see the vague outlines of a decaying body. The rib cage has been broken open, and a heart still beats inside it.

languages.text: 透过茧的半透明薄膜，你看到一具腐烂尸体的模糊轮廓。尸体的肋骨被翻开，里面的心脏还在跳动。
languages.original_text: Through the cocoon's translucent film you can see the vague outlines of a decaying body. The rib cage has been broken open, and a heart still beats inside it.

traits.locale_text: 透过茧的半透明薄膜，你看到一具腐烂尸体的模糊轮廓。尸体的肋骨被翻开，里面的心脏还在跳动。

languages.text: A través de la película translúcida de la crisálida ves la tenue silueta de un cuerpo en descomposición. La caja torácica está abierta, pero el corazón que contiene aún late.
languages.original_text: Through the cocoon's translucent film you can see the vague outlines of a decaying body. The rib cage has been broken open, and a heart still beats inside it.

traits.locale_text: A través de la película translúcida de la crisálida ves la tenue silueta de un cuerpo en descomposición. La caja torácica está abierta, pero el corazón que contiene aún late.

languages.text: 繭の半透明の膜を通して腐敗する死体の形がうっすらと確認できる。あばら骨は割られ、その中で心臓がまだ鼓動している。
languages.original_text: Through the cocoon's translucent film you can see the vague outlines of a decaying body. The rib cage has been broken open, and a heart still beats inside it.

traits.locale_text: 繭の半透明の膜を通して腐敗する死体の形がうっすらと確認できる。あばら骨は割られ、その中で心臓がまだ鼓動している。

languages.text: Durch den durchscheinenden Überzug des Kokons siehst du vage den Umriss einer verrottenden Leiche. Der Brustkorb wurde aufgebrochen, und darin schlägt immer noch ein Herz.
languages.original_text: Through the cocoon's translucent film you can see the vague outlines of a decaying body. The rib cage has been broken open, and a heart still beats inside it.

traits.locale_text: Durch den durchscheinenden Überzug des Kokons siehst du vage den Umriss einer verrottenden Leiche. Der Brustkorb wurde aufgebrochen, und darin schlägt immer noch ein Herz.

languages.text: À travers l'enveloppe translucide du cocon, vous discernez les vagues contours d'un corps en décomposition. Malgré le trou béant qui lui tient lieu de cage thoracique, son cœur semble toujours battre.
languages.original_text: Through the cocoon's translucent film you can see the vague outlines of a decaying body. The rib cage has been broken open, and a heart still beats inside it.

traits.locale_text: À travers l'enveloppe translucide du cocon, vous discernez les vagues contours d'un corps en décomposition. Malgré le trou béant qui lui tient lieu de cage thoracique, son cœur semble toujours battre.

languages.text: Kozanın yarı saydam zarından çürümekte olan bir bedenin muğlak hatlarını seçebiliyorsun. Göğüs kafesi kırılarak açılmış ancak kalbi hâlen atıyor.
languages.original_text: Through the cocoon's translucent film you can see the vague outlines of a decaying body. The rib cage has been broken open, and a heart still beats inside it.

traits.locale_text: Kozanın yarı saydam zarından çürümekte olan bir bedenin muğlak hatlarını seçebiliyorsun. Göğüs kafesi kırılarak açılmış ve içindeki kalp hâlen atmakta.
